Package homework3

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Building
    Building: is a class which creates building objects with parameters (1) the cost to construct the building and (2) the amount of required workers to construct it.
    CivilizationGame
    Author: Marios Pafitis 911719 mpafit02 This class is the main class of the game.
    Civilizations
    Civilizations is the superclass of classes Egypt, QinDynasty and RomanEmpire.
    CoalMine
    This class is responsible for the coal mine.
    Desert
    This class represents the Desert.
    Egypt
    Egypt is a type o civilization.
    Fish
    The class Fish creates objects to feed the civilians Constructors: Fish(int health) // calls the super constructor with the parameter health to initialize the value
    Game
    The class Game creates objects to feed the civilians Constructors: Game(int health) // calls the super constructor with the parameter health to initialize the value
    Hills
    The ground of the hills allows to the civilians have access in three recourses: Hunt, Gold and Coal Constructors: Hills() // randomly hides gold coins and coals in different places // in the Hills.
    Population
    This class represents the population of a civilization.
    QinDynasty
    Qin Dynasty is a type o civilization.
    Resources
    The class Resources is the superclass of the subclasses Game and Fish.It represents the food for the civillians Getters: getHealth() // returns healthIncrease Constructors: Resources(int health) // sets to healthIncrease the value of health Resources() // sets to healthIncrease the value of 20
    River
    The class River provides food to the civilians.
    RomanEmpire
    Roman Empire is a type o civilization.
    Settlement
    This class contains an array of Buildings for the Civilization.
    Strategy
    This class represents the strategy of the war.
    Technology
    This class represents the evolution of our Civilization.
    Treasury
    Is the class which represents the money of our Civilization.
